channel.title: Teach-in on Vietnam
channel.description:
Highlights of 15-hour debate on U.S. policy in Viet Nam and Southeast Asia: The National Teach-In on Viet Nam in Washington, D.C.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Highlights, part twenty one
item.description: This program features part of a debate on how to proceed with American foreign policy in Vietnam and Southeast Asia.
item.dc:creator: WAMU-FM (Radio station : Washington, D.C.)
item.dc:subject: World Politics

item.title: Highlights, part twenty two
item.description: This program features part of a debate on how to proceed with American foreign policy in Vietnam and Southeast Asia.
item.dc:creator: WAMU-FM (Radio station : Washington, D.C.)
